Card Text: Reduce the cost to play Mirkwood Hunter by 1 for each attachment on the active location.
Cycle: The Wilds of Rhovanion & Ered Mithrin

Name: Familiar Lands
Card Text: Action: Each location with an attachment gets -2 Threat until the end of the phase.
Cycle: The Wilds of Rhovanion & Ered Mithrin

Name: Warrior Sword
Card Text: Attach to a Tactics or Warrior character. Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +1 Attack for each enemy engaged with you. (Limit +3 Attack.)
Cycle: The Wilds of Rhovanion & Ered Mithrin

Name: Swift and Strong
Card Text: Response: After a character you control attacks and destroys an enemy, exhaust a Weapon attached to that character to ready that character and give it +2 Attack for its next attack this phase.
Cycle: The Wilds of Rhovanion & Ered Mithrin

Name: Descendant of Girion
Card Text: Reduce the cost to play Item attachments on Descendant of Girion by 1.
Cycle: The Wilds of Rhovanion & Ered Mithrin

Name: Valiant Determination
Card Text: Attach to an ally. Attached ally does not exhaust to quest.
Cycle: The Wilds of Rhovanion & Ered Mithrin

Name: Ring of Thrór
Card Text: Attach to a Dwarf hero. Action: Exhaust Ring of Thrór and discard the top card of your deck to ready attached hero. If the discarded card is an attachment, put it into play.
Cycle: The Wilds of Rhovanion & Ered Mithrin

Name: Bilbo Baggins (OHaUH)
Card Text: The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins. Bilbo Baggins cannot gain resources from player card effects. If Bilbo leaves play, the players have lost the game
Notes: If the first player's threat reaches 50 then both players have lost the game due to Bilbo having to be discarded.

Name: Thorin Oakenshield
Card Text: If you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, add 1 additional resource to Thorin Oakenshield's pool when you collect resources during the resource phase.

Name: Nori
Card Text: Response: After a Dwarf ally enters play under your control, reduce your threat by 1.
Notes: Should read: “Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand, reduce your threat by 1.” (FAQ 1.4)

Name: Ori
Card Text: If you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, draw 1 additional card at the beginning of the resource phase.

Name: Beorn
Card Text:
Cannot have attachments.
Immune to player card effects.
Beorn does not exhaust to defend.
Notes: Beorn's text is only active if he is in play, so a player could use a card to pull Beorn out of the discard pile should Beorn be killed. (FAQ)

Name: Fili
Card Text: Response: After you play Fili from your hand during the planning phase, search your deck for Kili and put him into play under your control. Then, shuffle your deck.

Name: Kili
Card Text: Response: After you play Kili from your hand during the planning phase, search your deck for Fili and put him into play under your control. Then, shuffle your deck.

Name: Bofur
Card Text: Action: Exhaust Bofur to search the top 5 cards of your deck for 1 Weapon attachment. Add that card to your hand and shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

Name: Dori
Card Text: Response: After a hero is assigned any amount of damage, exhaust Dori to place that damage on Dori instead.

Name: Gandalf
Card Text:
Gandalf does not exhaust to commit to a quest.
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, discard Gandalf from play. You may raise your threat by 2 to cancel this effect.

Name: Cram
Card Text: Attach to a hero. Action: Discard Cram to ready attached hero.

Name: Spare Hood and Cloak
Card Text: Action: Exhaust Spare Hood and Cloak and exhaust attached character to ready another character. Then, attach Spare Hood and Cloak to that character.
Notes: General consensus is that you can use this on already 'ready' characters though debate is open. See Crumbling Ruin (KD49) response from Nate.

Name: Thror's Map
Card Text: Attach to a hero. Action: Exhaust Thror's Map to choose a location in the staging area. Make that location the active location. (If there is another active location, return it to the staging area.)
Notes:
Should read: “Travel Action: Exhaust Thrór’s Map to choose a location in the staging area...” (FAQ 1.4)

Does not need an active location already. No travel effects trigger on the location because you didn't 'Travel' there.

Name: A Very Good Tale
Card Text: Action: Exhaust 2 allies you control to shuffle your deck and discard the top 5 cards. Put up to 2 allies discarded by this effect into play under your control. The total cost of the allies put into play cannot exceed the total cost of the allies exhausted to pay for this effect.

Name: Foe-hammer
Card Text: Response: After a hero you control attacks and destroys an enemy, exhaust a Weapon card attached to that hero to draw 3 cards.

Name: Goblin-cleaver
Card Text: Combat Action: Exhaust a Weapon card attached to a hero you control to choose an enemy engaged with you. Deal 2 damage to that enemy. (Deal 3 damage instead if the enemy is an Orc.)

Name: Late Adventurer
Card Text: Quest Action: Exhaust a character you control that is not committed to the quest to commit that character to the quest.

Name: Expecting Mischief
Card Text:
Play during the quest phase, before the staging step.
Action: Deal 2 damage to the first enemy revealed from the encounter deck this phase.
Notes: Surge should still apply, as the card is worded differently than Thalin. Note that there is no endless loop potential, as it is only "the first enemy" revealed from the encounter deck the first time it shows up. (Nate)

Name: Burglar Baggins
Card Text: Action: Bilbo Baggins gets +2 [Willpower], +2 [Attack], and +2 [Defense] until the end of the phase. (You may spend a [Baggins] resource from Bilbo Baggins' resource pool to play this card even if you do not control Bilbo Baggins.)

Name: Sting
Card Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins. Restricted. Bilbo Baggins gets +1 [Willpower], +1 [Attack], and +1 [Defense]. Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the discarded card's [Threat].
Notes: Cards other than the attachment card type are only considered attachments after they are attached to something. Therefore, you cannot use Master of the Forge to search for Treasure. Nor can you use Erebor Hammersmith to return a Treasure card from you discard pile to your hand because each of those abilities targets the attachment card type not the Treasure card type. (FFG)

Name: Orcrist
Card Text:
Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached character gets +2 [Attack]. Response: After attached hero destroys an Orc enemy, add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.
Notes: Cards other than the attachment card type are only considered attachments after they are attached to something. Therefore, you cannot use Master of the Forge to search for Treasure. Nor can you use Erebor Hammersmith to return a Treasure card from you discard pile to your hand because each of those abilities targets the attachment card type not the Treasure card type. (FFG)

Name: Glamdring
Card Text: Attach to a hero or Gandalf. Restricted. Attached character gets +2 [Attack]. Response: After attached character destroys an Orc enemy, draw 1 card.
Notes: Cards other than the attachment card type are only considered attachments after they are attached to something. Therefore, you cannot use Master of the Forge to search for Treasure. Nor can you use Erebor Hammersmith to return a Treasure card from you discard pile to your hand because each of those abilities targets the attachment card type not the Treasure card type. (FFG)

Name: Bilbo Baggins (OtD)
Card Text:
Bilbo Baggins does not count against the hero limit and cannot gain resources from non-treasure cards. The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins.
Action: Spend one [Baggins] resource to search your deck for a treasure card and add it to your hand.
If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players have lost the game.

Name: Balin
Card Text: Response: Play 1 resource from Balin's resource pool to cancel a shadow effect just triggered during an attack. Then, deal the attacking enemy another shadow card. (Limit once per attack.)

Name: Bard the Bowman
Card Text: When Bard the Bowman makes a ranged attack, the enemy he attacks gets -2 [Defense] until the end of the phase.
Notes: Caleb rules that Hands Upon the Bow doesn't trigger Bard's ability.

Name: Óin
Card Text: While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, Oin gets +1 [Attack] and gains the [Tactics] resource icon.

Name: Bombur (OtD)
Card Text: Action: Exhaust Bombur to choose a location. That location gets   -1 Threat until the end of the phase. (That location does not contribute its Threat instead if it is an Underground location.)

Name: Glóin
Card Text: Response: After Glóin suffers damage, add 1 resource to his resource pool for each point of damage he just suffered.

Name: Bifur
Card Text: While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, Bifur gains: "Response: After you play Bifur from your hand, draw 2 cards.

Name: Dwalin
Card Text: While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, lower the cost to play Dwalin by 2.

Name: Straight Shot
Card Text: Action: Exhaust a Weapon attachment to choos a non-unique enemy with 0 [Defense]. Discard the chosen enemy.

Name: Desperate Alliance
Card Text: Action: Choose a hero you control. Until the end of the phase, give control of that hero and all resouces in that hero's resource pool to another player. (Limit 1 per phase)
Notes: If players split due to a quest splitting them up, the hero does come back to the original player's hero pool and you cannot use Desperate Alliance once the spit has happened.

Name: Ravens of the Mountain
Card Text: Action: Exhaust a hero you control to shuffle the encounter decks and reveal (Errata'd to "look at") its top card. Place progress tokens on the current quest equal to the revealed card's [Threat]. Then put that card back on top of the encounter deck.
Notes: Should read: “Action: Exhaust a hero you control to shuffle the encounter deck and look at its top card..." [FAQ 1.5]. This is a relief, as 'revealing' could be very, very bad.

Name: To me! O my kinsfolk!
Card Text: Action: If you control at least 1 Dwarf hero, put a Dwarf ally from your discard pile into play under your control. Put that ally on the bottom of your deck at the end of a phase.

Name: The Lucky Number
Card Text: Action: Choose a character in play (other than Bilbo Baggins). Add Bilbo Baggins' total [Willpower], [Attack], and [Defense] to that character's [Willpower], [Attack], and [Defense] respectively until the end of the phase.

Name: Great Yew Bow
Card Text:
Attach to a hero with the printed Ranged keyword.
Restricted.
Combat Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Exhaust Great Yew Bow and attached hero to make a ranged attack against that enemy. Declare attached hero as the attacker. No other attackers can be declared for this attack.
Notes: Cannot be used to attack enemies that are immune to player card effects because it targets the enemy, not the player. Can't be used outside of the combat phase.

Name: Black Arrow
Card Text:
Limit 1 per deck.
Attach to a hero with Ranged.
Response: After attached hero declares an attack, add Black Arrow to the victory display to give attached hero +5 [Attack] for this attack.

Name: Thrór's Key
Card Text: Response: After a location is added to the staging area, attach Thror's Key to that location. While attached to a location, Thror's Key gains: "Treat attached location's printed text box as blank, except for traits.

Name: Expert Treasure-hunter
Card Text:
Attach to a hero.
Response: After attached hero quests successfully, name a card type and discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card is the named type, take it into your hand.
Notes: If multiple are attached, resolve each separately.

Name: King Under the Mountain
Card Text:
Attach to a Dwarf hero.
Action: Exhaust King Under the Mountain to look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the other.

Name: Bilbo's Magic Ring
Card Text:
Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Action: Exhaust Bilbo's Magic Ring and raise your threat by 1 to gain 1 [Baggins] resource. (Limit once per round.)
Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend an attack, exhaust Bilbo's Magic Ring and raise your threat by 3 to cancel all damage from this attack.

Name: The Arkenstone
Card Text:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust The Arkenstone and raise your threat by X to lower by the X the cost of the next ally you play this phase that matches the attached hero's sphere.

Name: Mithril Shirt
Card Text:
Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Attached hero gets +1 [Defense] and +1 hit point.

Name: Thrór's Battle Axe
Card Text:
Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached hero gets +2 [Attack].
Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, deal 1 damage to another engaged with you.

Name: Thrór's Hunting Bow
Card Text:
Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached hero gains Ranged.
When making a ranged attack, attached hero gets +2 [Attack]

Name: Thrór's Golden Cup
Card Text:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Add Thror's Golden Cup to the victory display to draw 3 cards.

Name: Frodo Baggins (TBR)
Card Text: Spend 1 [Fellowship] resource and exhaust The One Ring to cancel the effect of an encounter card just revealed from the encounter deck. Shuffle that card back into the encounter deck and reveal another encounter card.

Name: Sam Gamgee (TBR)
Card Text: Response: After you engage an enemy with a higher engagement cost than your threat, ready Sam Gamgee. He gets +1 [Willpower], +1 [Attack], and +1 [Defense] until the end of the round.

Name: Merry (TBR)
Card Text:
Merry gets +1 [Attack] for each Hobbit hero you control.
Response: After Merry participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, ready another character that participated in that attack.

Name: Pippin (TBR)
Card Text:
Each enemy in play gets +1 engagement cost for each Hobbit hero you control.
Response: After you engage an enemy with a engagement cost higher than your threat, draw a card.

Name: Fatty Bolger
Card Text: Action: Exhaust Fatty Bolger to choose an enemy in the staging area and raise your threat by that enemy's [Threat]. Until the end of the phase, that enemy does not contribute its [Threat]. (Limit once per round.)

Name: Bill the Pony
Card Text:
Lower the cost to play Bill the Pony by 2 if you control Sam Gamgee. Cannot have attachments.
Each Hobbit character gets +1 hit point.

Name: Barliman Butterbur
Card Text: If each hero you control has the Hobbit trait, damage from undefended attacks against you may be assigned to Barliman Butterbur.

Name: Farmer Maggot
Card Text: Response: After Farmer Maggot enters play, deal 1 damage to an enemy engaged with you. (Deal 2 damage instead if that enemy's engagement cost is highger than your threat.)

Name: Halfling Determination
Card Text: Action: Choose a Hobbit character. That character gets +2 [Willpower], +2 [Attack], and +2 [Defense] until the end of the phase.

Name: Smoke Rings
Card Text: Action: Reduce your threat by 1 for each Pipe you control. Each hero with a Pipe attachment gets +1 [Willpower] until the end of the phase.

Name: Take No Notice
Card Text:
Lower the cost to play Take No Notice by 1 for each Hobbit or Ranger hero you control.
Action: Add 5 to each enemy's engagement cost until the end of the round.

Name: Frodo's Intuition
Card Text: Action: Each hero you control gets +1 [Willpower] until the end of the round. Draw 1 card for each Hobbit hero you control.

Name: Hobbit Cloak
Card Text:
Attach to a Hobbit hero. Limit 1 per hero.
Attached hero gets +2 [Defense] while defending against an attack made by an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat.

Name: Dagger of Westernesse
Card Text:
Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached hero gets +1 [Attack] (+2 [Attack instead if attacking an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat).

Name: Hobbit Pipe
Card Text:
Attach to a Hobbit. Limit 1 per character.
Response: After your threat is reduced by an event card effect, exhaust Hobbit Pipe to draw a card.

Name: Elf-stone
Card Text:
Attach to the active location. Attached location gets +1 quest point. 
Response: After attached location leaves play as an explored location, the first player puts 1 ally into play from his hand.
Notes: Cannot use on locations that are immune to player card effects.

Name: Frodo Baggins (TRD)
Card Text: Response: After Frodo Baggins exhausts to defend an attack, exhaust The One Ring and spend 1 Fellowship resource to target the attacking enemy. Then, this attack deals no damage and each player raises his threat by 2.

Name: Gandalf (TRD)
Card Text: Play with the top card of your deck faceup. Once per phase, you may play the top card of your deck as if it was in your hand. When playing a card this way, Gandalf is considered to have the printed Leadership, Lore, Tactics, and Spirit icons.

Name: Galadriel (TRD)
Card Text: At the end of the round, discard Galadriel from play. Response: After you play Galadriel from your hand, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an attachment of cost 3 or less and put it into play. Put the remaining cards back in any order.

Name: Boromir (TRD)
Card Text: Boromir gets +2 Defense while defending against an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat. Response: After Boromir takes any amount of damage, ready him.

Name: Elrond (TRD)
Card Text: At the end of the round, discard Elrond from play. Response: After Elrond enters play, choose one: heal all damage on a hero, discard a Condition attachment, or each player draws 1 card.

Name: Bilbo Baggins
Card Text: Response: After Bilbo Baggins enters play, search your deck for a Pipe attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Name: Flame of Anor
Card Text: Action: Add Flame of Anor to the victory display and discard the top card of your deck to ready an Istari character you control. That character gets +X Attack until the end of the phase where X is the discarded card's cost.

Name: Gandalf's Staff
Card Text: Attach to Gandalf. Action: Exhaust Gandalf's Staff to (choose one): choose a player to draw 1 card, add 1 resource to a hero's resource pool, or discard a shadow card from a non-unique enemy.

Name: Wizard Pipe
Card Text: Attach to an Istari character. Limit 1 per character. Action: Exhaust Wizard Pipe to exchange a card in your hand with the top card of your deck.

Name: Fellowship of the Ring
Card Text: Attach to the Ring-bearer. Each hero gets +1 Willpower. Forced: After a character is destroyed, discard Fellowship of the Ring.

Name: Aragorn(TToS)
Card Text: The first player gains control of Aragorn. If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game. Action: Spend 2 resources from Aragorn's resource pool to ready a hero.

Name: Théoden (TToS)
Card Text: Reduce the cost of the first Rohan ally you play from your hand each round by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Name: Treebeard (TToS)
Card Text: Cannot have restricted attachments. Action: Deal 1 damage to Treebeard to give him +1 Willpower and +1 Attack until the end of the phase. (Limit 5 times per phase.)

Name: Gimli (TToS)
Card Text: Response: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck, ready Gimli.

Name: Legolas (TToS)
Card Text: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, draw 1 card.

Name: Quickbeam (TToS)
Card Text: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted. Response: After Quickbeam enters play, deal 1 damage to him to ready him.

Name: Háma (TToS)
Card Text: Combat Action: Ready Háma. He gets +3 Defense until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard Háma. (Limit once per round.)
Notes: The card you wish to retrieve must already be in the discard pile. So cards like Quick Strike or Hands Upon the Bow played on Hama are not eligible. (FFG)

Name: Arod
Card Text: Attach to a hero or Legolas. Response: After attached character participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, exhaust Arod to place 1 progress token on any location.

Name: Ent Draught
Card Text: Play only if you control at least 1 Ent character. Attach to a character. Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +2 hit points.

Name: Herugrim
Card Text: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted. Reduce the cost to play Herugrim on Théoden by 1. Response: After attached hero is declared as an attacker, exhaust Herugrim to add attached hero's Willpower to its Attack for this attack.

Name: Entmoot
Card Text: Play only if you control at least 1 Ent character. Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Ent cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

Name: Helm! Helm!
Card Text: Play only after the resolving enemy attacks step is complete. Combat Action: Exhaust and discard a Rohan ally you control to choose and discard a non-unique enemy engaged with you.

Name: The Three Hunters
Card Text: Play only if you control Fellowship Aragorn. Quest Action: Choose 3 heroes committed to the quest. Ready those heroes. Until the end of the round, each of the chosen heroes gets +1 Willpower, +1 Attack and +1 Defense.

Name: Shadowfax
Card Text: Attach to Gandalf. Gandalf gains ranged and sentinel. Action: Exhaust Shadowfax to ready Gandalf.

Name: Frodo Baggins(TLoS)
Card Text: Action: Spend 1 Fellowship resource and exhaust The One Ring to give Frodo Baggins +2 Willpower and +2 Attack until the end of the round.

Name: Faramir (TLoS)
Card Text: Response: After you engage an enemy, ready an ally you control. (Limit once per phase.)

Name: Damrod (TLoS)
Card Text: Reduce the cost of the first Trap card you play each round by 1 (to a minimum of 0). Response: After a Trap card you control is attached to an enemy, draw 1 card.

Name: Anborn (TLoS)
Card Text: Response: After an enemy is added to the staging area, exhaust Anborn to give that enemy +5 engagement cost until the end of the round. Then, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

Name: Mablung (TLoS)
Card Text: Response: After Mablung enters play, choose an enemy to get +5 engagement cost until the end of the round. Then, you may engage that enemy, or return it to the staging area.

Name: Skinbark
Card Text: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted. While Skinbark is attacking alone against an Orc enemy, that enemy does not count its Defense.

Name: Gamling
Card Text: Response: After a Rohan ally you control is discarded from play, exhaust Gamling to return that ally to your hand.

Name: Staff of Lebethron
Card Text: Attach to a Gondor or Hobbit hero. Restricted. Response: After attached hero exhausts to defend an attack from an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, exhaust Staff of Lebethron to discard a shadow card from that enemy.

Name: Ambush
Card Text: Play Ambush into the staging area unattached. If unattached, attach Ambush to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area. Combat Action: The engaged player discards Ambush to declare an attack against the attached enemy.

Name: Snowmane
Card Text: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted. If attached hero is Theoden, Snowmane loses the restricted keyword. Response: After attached hero quests successfully, ready attached hero.

Name: Taste it Again!
Card Text: Response: After a hero you control defends an attack made by an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, ready that hero. Until the end of the phase, that hero gets +2 Attack while attacking that enemy.

Name: In the Shadows
Card Text: Lower the cost to play In the Shadows by 1 for each Hobbit or Ranger hero you control. Combat Action: Each enemy engaged with you with engagement cost higher than your threat gets -1 Attack and -1 Defense until the end of the phase.

Name: Speak Your Promise!
Card Text: Action: Ready the Ring-bearer to choose an enemy engaged with you. If the Ring-bearer's Willpower is greater than that enemy’s Threat, lower its Attack and Defense by the difference until the end of the phase.

Name: Aragorn (TFotW)
Card Text: The first player gains control of Aragorn. If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game. While Aragorn has an Artifact attached, he gains sentinel and does not exhaust to quest.

Name: Éowyn
Card Text: Setup: Reduce your threat by 3. Action: Raise your threat by 3 to ready Éowyn. She gets +9 Attack until the end of the phase. (Limit once per game for the group.)

Name: Beregond (TFotW)
Card Text: Response: After Beregond defends an attack and takes no damage, reduce the defending player's threat by 1. (Limit once per round.)

Name: Grimbold
Card Text: Combat Action: Discard Grimbold to choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.

Name: Prince Imrahil (TFotW)
Card Text: While there is a hero in your discard pile, Prince Imrahil loses the ally card type and gains the hero card type.

Name: Halbarad (TFotW)
Card Text: Reduce the cost to play Halbarad by 1 for each enemy engaged with you. Each enemy engaged with you gets +10 engagement cost.

Name: Ghân-buri-Ghân
Card Text: X is the Threat of the active location. Travel Action: Discard Ghân-buri-Ghân to travel to a location without resolving its Travel effect.

Name: Sterner than Steel
Card Text: Response: Exhaust a Weapon or Armor card attached to the defending character to cancel a shadow effect just triggered in combat

Name: Desperate Defense
Card Text: Response: After a sentinel character is declared as a defender, it gets +2 Defense for this attack. If this attack deals no damage, ready the defending character.

Name: Golden Shield
Card Text: Attach to a Rohan hero. Response: After attached hero is declared as a defender, exhaust Golden Shield to add attached hero's Willpower to its Defense for this attack.

Name: Livery of the Tower
Card Text: Attach to a Gondor hero. Response: Spend X resources from attached hero's pool to cancel X damage just dealt to attached hero.

Name: Roheryn
Card Text: Attach to a Dúnedain hero. If the attached hero is Aragorn, he gains a Tactics icon. Response: After you optionally engage an enemy, exhaust Roheryn and attached hero to declare attached hero as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against that eneny.

Name: Banner of Elendil
Card Text: Attach to Aragorn. While Aragorn is questing, each other questing character you control gets +1 Willpower. While Aragorn is attacking, each other attacking character you control gets +1 Attack.

Name: Frodo Baggins (TMoF)
Card Text: Planning Action: Exhaust The One Ring to add 1 resource to a hero's pool.

Name: Aragorn (TMoF)
Card Text: The first player gains control of Aragorn. Action: Spend 1 resource from Aragorn's pool to ready him. (Limit once per phase.) If Aragorn leaves play the players lose the game.

Name: Éomer (TMoF)
Card Text: Response: After Éomer commits to the quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to immediately declare him as an attacker (and resolve his attack) against an enemy in the staging area.

Name: Tom Cotton
Card Text: While you are engaged with an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat, the first Hobbit ally you play each round does not require a resource match. Response: After a Hobbit ally enters play, it gets +2 Attack until the end of the round.

Name: Rosie Cotton
Card Text: Action: Exhaust Rosie Cotton to choose a Hobbit hero and an attribute (Willpower, Attack, Defense). Add Rosie Cotton's Willpower to that hero's chosen attribute until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

Name: Elfhelm (TMoF)
Card Text: Action: Spend 1 resource from a Rohan hero's resource pool to put Elfhelm into play from your hand under your control. At the end of the phase, discard Elfhelm if he is still in play.

Name: Elladan (TMoF)
Card Text: While Elrohir is in play, Elladan gets +2 Attack. Response: After you optionally engage an Orc enemy, ready Elladan.

Name: Elrohir (TMoF)
Card Text: While Elladan is in play, Elrohir gets +2 Defense. Response: After you optionally engage an Orc enemy, ready Elrohir.

Name: Captains of the West
Card Text: Quest Action: Until the end of the phase, each Noble hero gets +1 Willpower and does not exhaust to commit to the quest.

Name: Raise the Shire
Card Text: Response: After you engage an enemy, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Hobbit ally and put it into play (search you entire deck instead if that enemy's engagement cost is higher than your threat). Shuffle your deck. At the end of the round, if that ally is still in play, return it to your hand.

Name: Gúthwinë
Card Text: Attach to a Rohan hero. Response: After attached hero is declared as an attacker, exhaust Gúthwinë to give that hero +2 Attack for this attack. If this attack destroys an enemy, return a Rohan ally from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Friend of Friends
Card Text: Attach to a Hobbit hero. Limit 2 copies of Friend of Friends in play. While another hero has Friend of Friends attached, attached hero gets +1 Willpower, +1 Attack, +1 Defense and +1 hit point.

Name: Orc Disguise
Card Text: Attach to the Ring-bearer. Limit 1 per hero. While an Orc is making an enagement check with you, it gets +5 engagement cost. Response: After an Orc engages you, discard Orc Disguise. Until the end of the round, that enemy cannot attack you.

Name: Aragon (FotB)
Card Text: Response: After Aragorn commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

Name: Aragon (ToF)
Card Text: Response: After Aragorn commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

Name: Glorfindel (TWQ)
Card Text: Action: Pay 1 resource from Glorfindel's pool to heal 1 damage on any character. (Limit once per round.)

Name: Gimli (TRoB)
Card Text: Gimli gets +1 Attack for each damage token on him.

Name: Legolas (MatPP)
Card Text: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, place 2 progress tokens on the current quest.

Name: Faramir (TSoA)
Card Text: Response: After you engage an enemy, ready an ally you control. (Limit once per phase.)

Name: Boromir (TSoA)
Card Text: Action: Raise your threat by 1 to ready Boromir. Action: Discard Boromir to deal 2 damage to each enemy engaged with a single player.

Name: Celeborn (AoDG)
Card Text: Response: After a Silvan ally enters play, that ally gets +1 Willpower, +1 Attack, and +1 Defense until the end of the round.

Name: Gladriel (AoDG)
Card Text: Galadriel cannot quest, attack or defend. Allies you control do not exhaust to commit to the quest during the round they enter play. Action: Exhaust Galadriel to choose a player. That player reduces his threat by 1 and draws 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

Name: Éowyn (TWR)
Card Text: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Éowyn +1 Willpower until the end of the phase. This effect may be triggered by each player once each round.
